Flicker smiled at the thought before he realized they
were talking about Phoenix, not Riekan.  His smile
dropped instantly.

Flicker:  O.k.

He transformed and headed towards his shuttle.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> "Forgetting who's in charge again, I see," Gatara
> snorts.  "I'll 
> forgive it this time.  Riekan!"
> 
> "Yes?"  The greyish-blue Rogue still seems
> disinterested, but Gatara 
> doesn't appear to notice.
> 
> "Go make the necessary preparations.  Predacon, if
> you try anything I 
> don't like, it comes out of HER hide, got it?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Flicker:  Give me half a Solar Cycle (day and I
> don't care what LN 
> > says) and I can rig up a ground transport.  I made
> sure to have all 
> > the neccesary supplies because I thought I'd need
> to transport it 
> to 
> > Megatron.  I offer half my cargo to you.  I
> suggest you send 
> someone 
> > to decide what you need the most.  I have
> everything from energon 
> > cubes, obviously useless on this planet, to ship
> parts, to ammo, to 
> > weapons, to any other technical supplies you might
> need.
> > 
> > Flicker began calculating strategies in case of a
> double-cross.
> > 
> > Flicker:  Oh and whoever you send should bring
> Phoenix with him.  I 
> > don't want to let her out of my sight.
> 
>
